Gravity and Physics reinvented. This is a gripping game with a great story and incredible game physics. It will warp your mind and push you to thinking outside, or quite frankly with the loveable box..

Pokud se mě zeptáte, jaká je moje nejoblíbenější hra, řeknu Portal. To si prostě musí zkusit každý.
este jogo é fera! muito bom

Portal 2 is one of my favorite games of all time, and I can't express why I love it so much.

As a sequel to Portal, which already was an amazing game, it improves on almost every aspect.

The game is longer, it continues the story of it's predecessor with more engaging details, the puzzles are more involved (may be a little too involved as some puzzles might get a little difficult), visuals and audio are better than before with the broken down chambers of aperture and old aperture looking incredible, the addition of Steam's Workshop allowing for custom single and co-op levels with creative puzzles that may challenge you, only real setback for the game is the atmosphere which for the most part isn't as chilling as the original except for the old aperture segments but beyond that I would recommend this game to everyone who's new to steam as it introduces many of its amazing features.

ok maybe play portal 1 first but then play this right after
Очень крутая головоломка, когда прошел 1/2 игры так сломал голову что несмог пройти без no-clip.

My favorite game of all time. This game simply has such a geat story mode. Coop is super fun, and you can also play custom maps (Singleplayer and Coop). 
Super fun with grat humor. And for his age still one of the best games I have ever played.
The co-op is a lot of fun

This game was a lot of fun and a great sequel to the original. It has a great story with amazing humorous dialogue like the original and expands with a longer story and more unique and difficult puzzles. The new mechanics added by the gels and other features of rooms. The co-op is even a lot of fun with a friend tackling some difficult challenges together. I highly reccommend this game to those who loved the first game and those who enjoy puzzle games with comedy.
Sem palavras na moral q jogo top

This is the best game I have ever played. The story and characters are incredible and are greatly executed.
The world and space are imersive and makes you think you are a part of it.
I recomend this game for anyone.
Una vuelta de tuerca a la primera parte, más largo, más puzzles, mejores gráficos. Genial.

เป็นเกม puzzle ที่มีเรื่อราวแปลกใหม่ ถึงเกมนี้จะออกมาตั้งแต่ปี 2011 แล้ว แต่มันก็ยังเป็นเกมที่เราสามารถเอากลับมาเล่นได้ทุกเมื่อ ซึ่งเนื้อเรื่องก็ให้ข้อคิดกับผู้เล่นหลายอย่าง ไม่ว่าจะเป็นเรื่องเพื่อน เรื่องการไว้ใจซึ่งกันและกัน ใครที่ชอบเล่นเกมแนว puzzle และชอบเกมที่มีเนื้อหาล้ำสมัย แปลกใหม่ ขอแนะนำให้เล่นเกมนี้
An awesome sequel and the best game Valve has ever made. I reccomend.
still one of the best singleplayer experiences out there
amazing, fun and still great to play in 2018, portal 2 stand as the best story valve has ever made
I just drop here box with Fallout76
Лучшая игра с проработанной физикой, тортиком, графикой, низкими системными требованиями и с очень интересными головоломками. В общем советую купить (денег не пожалеете).
I love that game. Both single player and co-op are amazing.

C'est mon jeu préféré, l'histoire est géniale, le mode coop demande une synchronisation et une écoute constante de son partenaire. Le Workshop permet de continuer à s'amuser sur des maps inédites une fois qu'on a fini le contenu officiel.

C'est vraiment un mode de jeu que j'adore et une façon totalement innovante de faire des puzzles, je recommande ce jeu très fortement si vous aimez les casse tête.
Если тебе она не нравится, у тебя нет друзей() :steamhappy:
Ótimos puzzles e uma história muito boa
This is truly a great game. Its longer and better then the first game. Just imagine how good portal 3 will be.
amazing game! plus with workshop support, you never run out of content! <3

ДОСТОИНСТВА:
Головоломки стали еще интереснее и разнообразнее, есть кое-какой сюжет, неплоха музыка, приятная графика
НЕДОСТАТКИ:
Игра немного затянута в том плане, что головоломки порой кажутся просто бесконечными
Portal 2 - продолжение знаменитого игрового эксперимента Valve, имя которому, логично предположить, Portal. Первая часть игры стала в свое время хитом, вторая - лишь укрепила успех разработчиков.

Portal 2 - уже полноценная игра, в то время как первая часть была просто тренировкой, отработкой самой идеи, тестом, чтобы узнать как отреагирует на всю эту задумку потребитель.
Super consigliato, peccato non esita un Portal 3.

One of the best games ever made.
The story mode is exciting and funny.
The co-op part of the game is also really nice to play.
Bu oyunda gülmek için benim yaptığımı yapın. En manyak arkadaşınızla co-op oynayın.
If you don't already own this game, Whats wrong with you?
Eines der besten Spiele die jemals rausgekommen sind , kann ich nur weiter empfeheln

The replayable of this game is why is still the best of this year

Bardzo dobra kontynuacja znanej i lubianej gry o strzelaniu portalami: "Portal" od valve. Gra oparta na znanej mechanice portali. Logiczna + wymagająca + multiplayer + kostka towarzysząca + świetny pomysł i fabuła = Portal2 Zdecydowanie polecam zwłaszcza jeśli garczie z kolegami, bo sam spędziłem nad tą grą sporo czasu z moimi kolegami i dobrze się przy tym bawiliśmy. Czekamy na Portal3 !!!
